actions.name: BatchGetItem
actions.description: Grants permission to return the attributes of one or more items from one or more tables

actions.name: BatchWriteItem
actions.description: Grants permission to put or delete multiple items in one or more tables

actions.name: ConditionCheckItem
actions.description: Grants permission to the ConditionCheckItem operation checks the existence of a set of attributes for the item with the given primary key

actions.name: CreateBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a backup for an existing table

actions.name: CreateGlobalTable
actions.description: Grants permission to create a global table from an existing table

actions.name: CreateTable
actions.description: Grants permission to the CreateTable operation adds a new table to your account

actions.name: CreateTableReplica
actions.description: Grants permission to add a new replica table

actions.name: DeleteBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an existing backup of a table

actions.name: DeleteItem
actions.description: Grants permission to deletes a single item in a table by primary key

actions.name: DeleteTable
actions.description: Grants permission to the DeleteTable operation which deletes a table and all of its items

actions.name: DeleteTableReplica
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a replica table and all of its items

actions.name: DescribeBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an existing backup of a table

actions.name: DescribeContinuousBackups
actions.description: Grants permission to check the status of the backup restore settings on the specified table

actions.name: DescribeContributorInsights
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the contributor insights status and related details for a given table or global secondary index

actions.name: DescribeExport
actions.description: Grants permission to describe an existing Export of a table

actions.name: DescribeGlobalTable
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified global table

actions.name: DescribeGlobalTableSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to return settings information about the specified global table

actions.name: DescribeKinesisStreamingDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to grant permission to describe the status of Kinesis streaming and related details for a given table

actions.name: DescribeLimits
actions.description: Grants permission to return the current provisioned-capacity limits for your AWS account in a region, both for the region as a whole and for any one DynamoDB table that you create there

actions.name: DescribeReservedCapacity
actions.description: Grants permission to describe one or more of the Reserved Capacity purchased

actions.name: DescribeReservedCapacityOfferings
actions.description: Grants permission to describe Reserved Capacity offerings that are available for purchase

actions.name: DescribeStream
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about a stream, including the current status of the stream, its Amazon Resource Name (ARN), the composition of its shards, and its corresponding DynamoDB table

actions.name: DescribeTable
actions.description: Grants permission to return information about the table

actions.name: DescribeTableReplicaAutoScaling
actions.description: Grants permission to describe the auto scaling settings across all replicas of the global table

actions.name: DescribeTimeToLive
actions.description: Grants permission to give a description of the Time to Live (TTL) status on the specified table

actions.name: DisableKinesisStreamingDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to grant permission to stop replication from the DynamoDB table to the Kinesis data stream

actions.name: EnableKinesisStreamingDestination
actions.description: Grants permission to grant permission to start table data replication to the specified Kinesis data stream at a timestamp chosen during the enable workflow

actions.name: ExportTableToPointInTime
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate an Export of a DynamoDB table to S3

actions.name: GetItem
actions.description: Grants permission to the GetItem operation that returns a set of attributes for the item with the given primary key

actions.name: GetRecords
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the stream records from a given shard

actions.name: GetShardIterator
actions.description: Grants permission to return a shard iterator

actions.name: ListBackups
actions.description: Grants permission to list backups associated with the account and endpoint

actions.name: ListContributorInsights
actions.description: Grants permission to list the ContributorInsightsSummary for all tables and global secondary indexes associated with the current account and endpoint

actions.name: ListExports
actions.description: Grants permission to list exports associated with the account and endpoint

actions.name: ListGlobalTables
actions.description: Grants permission to list all global tables that have a replica in the specified region

actions.name: ListStreams
actions.description: Grants permission to return an array of stream ARNs associated with the current account and endpoint

actions.name: ListTables
actions.description: Grants permission to return an array of table names associated with the current account and endpoint

actions.name: ListTagsOfResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list all tags on an Amazon DynamoDB resource

actions.name: PartiQLDelete
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a single item in a table by primary key

actions.name: PartiQLInsert
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new item, if an item with same primary key does not exist in the table

actions.name: PartiQLSelect
actions.description: Grants permission to read a set of attributes for items from a table or index

actions.name: PartiQLUpdate
actions.description: Grants permission to edit an existing item's attributes

actions.name: PurchaseReservedCapacityOfferings
actions.description: Grants permission to purchases reserved capacity for use with your account

actions.name: PutItem
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new item, or replace an old item with a new item

actions.name: Query
actions.description: Grants permission to use the primary key of a table or a secondary index to directly access items from that table or index

actions.name: RestoreTableFromAwsBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new table from recovery point on AWS Backup

actions.name: RestoreTableFromBackup
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new table from an existing backup

actions.name: RestoreTableToPointInTime
actions.description: Grants permission to restore a table to a point in time

actions.name: Scan
actions.description: Grants permission to return one or more items and item attributes by accessing every item in a table or a secondary index

actions.name: StartAwsBackupJob
actions.description: Grants permission to create a backup on AWS Backup with advanced features enabled

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a set of tags with an Amazon DynamoDB resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove the association of tags from an Amazon DynamoDB resource

actions.name: UpdateContinuousBackups
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable continuous backups

actions.name: UpdateContributorInsights
actions.description: Grants permission to update the status for contributor insights for a specific table or global secondary index

actions.name: UpdateGlobalTable
actions.description: Grants permission to add or remove replicas in the specified global table

actions.name: UpdateGlobalTableSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to update settings of the specified global table

actions.name: UpdateItem
actions.description: Grants permission to edit an existing item's attributes, or adds a new item to the table if it does not already exist

actions.name: UpdateTable
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the provisioned throughput settings, global secondary indexes, or DynamoDB Streams settings for a given table

actions.name: UpdateTableReplicaAutoScaling
actions.description: Grants permission to update auto scaling settings on your replica table

actions.name: UpdateTimeToLive
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or disable TTL for the specified table
